policies.workingHours: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM IST, Monday to Friday
policies.remotework: Eligible employees can work from home up to 2 days per week
policies.expenses: Submit expense claims within 30 days with valid receipts
policies.code_of_conduct: Professional behavior and ethical standards must be maintained
